7_1CHcEy3SYsQvrW9uskKTZxUWj97BmZmvfa.body:
I run mine at boot with systemd :)

Put:
```
[Unit]
Description=ZeroNet Service
After=multi-user.target

[Service]
Type=idle
WorkingDirectory=/opt/ZeroNet-master
ExecStart=/usr/bin/python /opt/ZeroNet-master/zeronet.py
User=NAME

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
```
in: "/lib/systemd/system/zeronet.service" (change "/opt/ZeroNet-master" to your install location and "NAME" with the name of your user that runs ZeroNet)

Then execute: `sudo systemctl daemon-reload`, `sudo systemctl enable zeronet.service`

and: `sudo systemctl start zeronet.service`
